articles.author: Stewart Bell
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton wins Chinese F1 sprint race for his first Ferrari victory - The Associated Press
articles.description: McLaren’s Oscar Piastri has scored his maiden pole position in Formula 1 ahead of Sunday’s Chinese Grand Prix by delivering two sizzling laps that were quick enough for the top spot ahead of Mercedes’ George Russell. The 23-year-old Australian was second in S…
